steps to take to successfully run

Take Full Control of Your Children Transportation

1

Download from the Play Store on any device

download the app from the App Store or Google Play on any device

2

Create an account with needful information

You can activate your account immediately through email 

3

Add child info then choose pickup & destination

After filling the child info we'll review it and cantact you asap 

Download and create your Parent account through the App

The app lets you create your own account and activate it online. Also you should fill your child info to set his route based on his pickup and destination locations.
